parameters.content:
## üìå Node Setup ‚Äì Initial Steps (Telegram ‚Üí Download Audio)

**1. Telegram Voice Message Trigger**
- **Node type:** `Telegram Trigger`
- **Credential:** Select your Telegram Bot credential (the bot created via BotFather)
- **Trigger On:** `Message`
- **Tip:** Only one Telegram Trigger per bot is allowed. This listens for every message (text, audio, etc.) sent to your bot.

**2. Buffer Delay (Pre-Processing)**
- **Node type:** `Wait`
- **No parameters required**  
  (Leave as default. This step adds a buffer to help prevent issues when multiple messages arrive at once.)

**3. Download Telegram Voice File**
- **Node type:** `Telegram`
- **Resource:** `file`
- **File ID:**

## üìå Node Setup ‚Äì AI Transcription & Email Generation **4. Transcribe Audio to Text (OpenAI Whisper)** - **Node type:** OpenAI / Langchain (Transcribe Recording) - **Resource:** `audio` - **Operation:** `transcribe` - **API Key/Credential:** Your OpenAI account/API key - This node sends the downloaded audio file to Whisper (OpenAI) and returns the transcribed text. **5. Buffer Delay (Pre-AI Processing)** - **Node type:** `Wait` - **No parameters required** (Leave as default. This adds a small delay to ensure the transcription is fully complete before moving to the AI.) **6. Generate Email Content ‚Äì AI AGENT** - **Node type:** AI Agent / Langchain - **Prompt type:** `define` - **Prompt (Text):** Use a custom prompt instructing the agent to: - Detect the recipient's email address (even partial, e.g. "send to fort.baptiste.pro", and complete if needed) - Understand user intent (resignation, request, excuse, etc.) - Generate a suitable email subject - Write a professional email in HTML (proper formatting, no spelling mistakes) - Example variable: ``` {{ $json.text }} ``` - **Model:** Connects to the `GPT-4 Email Generator Model` node (OpenAI Chat Model) - **Output Parser:** Connects to the `Enforce Email JSON Schema` node (Structured Output Parser) - **Credential:** Your OpenAI API key **7. GPT-4 Email Generator Model** - **Node type:** OpenAI Chat Model - **Model:** e.g. `gpt-4.1-mini` (as in your template) - **Credential:** Your OpenAI API key **8. Enforce Email JSON Schema** - **Node type:** Structured Output Parser - **JSON Example/Schema:** ```json { "email": "adresse@gmail.com", "subject": "Objet de l‚Äôemail", "body": "

Contenu HTML de l‚Äôemail

" } ``` - This node ensures the AI returns exactly the required fields and format for email sending. **9. Send Email** - **Node type:** Gmail - **To:** `{{$json.output.email}}` - **Subject:** `{{$json.output.subject}}` - **HTML Body:** `{{$json.output.body}}` - **Credential:** Your Gmail OAuth2 credential - This node sends the generated email to the intended recipient using Gmail.
